alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Penobscot; Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 8:15PM EDT until July 12 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN AROOSTOOK AND EAST CENTRAL PENOBSCOT COUNTIES... At 815 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Houlton to near Wytopitlock, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Danforth, Medway, Hodgdon, Sherman, Amity, Haynesville, Cary Plantation, Wytopitlock, Reed Plantation, Mattawamkeag, Woodville, Weston, Cary, Kingman, Reed, Orient, Macwahoc, Bancroft, Glenwood and Silver Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
